title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.


Observed Behavior (OB): When I try to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it does not get selected.

Expected Behavior (EB): The item should get selected when I try to select it in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
3. Notice that the item does not get selected.
4. Repeat the selection process for the same item.
5. Notice that the item gets selected the second time I try.
